pages.text: Gear in this mod is sectioned into "Tiers" (More info $(l:opweapons:tier_system/what_are_tiers)here$()). Even with the most basic gear you will still be extremely durable

To begin start by crafting OP Armor. $(br)OP Armor is a Tier 1 suit that will start your journey into OP Weapons. This armor has a durability of 7,500. When wearing it you will not take any damage as the armor absord 100% of any damage inflicted on you. This armor will repair itself in the Plains biome (if wearing the full set). $(li)Leggings grant you Speed 1$(li)Boots negate all fall damage.
